text: @MSNBC Trump is trying to distract and people focus on Michael Flynn because he is handling the Coronavirus pandemic poorly.  He doesn’t realize that pardoning Michael Flynn just adds to confusion and chaos he started . People are dying and he’s still trying to score a win.  It’s sad...
